description:
I was joking around with Jake.
"You've gotten quite good at getting your ass pounded," I said.
"Yeah," he said with that trademark smile of his. "I guess practice makes perfect."
"So have you been tempted to try it at home?"
"Not yet," he said. "I like to save it up for when I'm here!"
Doug laughed.
"I like to try new things out at home and then bring them here," he said. "Does that count?"
"Let's have you try a couple on Jake today," I said.
And he did. Jake's ass got a good fucking!
title: Doug & Jake
